doc.title: 30 de Junio
doc.plot: JUNE 30TH could be any date, a birthday, a wedding, the day you started your first job,..or the most important day of your life. We, the Spanish baby-boom generation, are afraid of having children. Meanwhile in the third world baby girls are been rejected. To be thirty years old , it's to ask yourself about having a child, or about adopting it. All those are the questions that this small poetic work (half documentary) arises to make you think and feel.

JUNE 30TH could be any date, a birthday, a wedding, the day you started your first job,..or the most important day of your life. We, the Spanish baby-boom generation, are afraid of having children. Meanwhile in the third world baby girls are been rejected. To be thirty years old , it's to ask yourself about having a child, or about adopting it. All those are the questions that this small poetic work (half documentary) arises to make you think and feel.
